Game.Name: Volley Ball (Spain) (Gluk Video) (Unl)
Game.plot: Overview:Volleyball is a simulation of the real-life sport, in which two teams have to use their hands to knock a ball over a high net without letting it drop on their side. It follows such single-word Nintendo sports games like Golf and Soccer.It is notable beyond being a Nintendo sport sim for two reasons: It was one of the earliest games for the Famicom Disk System - the fourth to be released for the peripheral - and sits between two of the biggest FDS releases: Super Mario Bros 2 and Metroid. The other notable element is that it was co-developed by Pax Softnica, which would go on to help develop many Nintendo games in a second-party role, notably the Mother series.
Game.Notes: Slam the perfect serve. Spike the game-winning point. Make the save that saves the game! It's all up to you. Because you call the shots in Nintendo VOLLEYBALL. You'll start by selecting a team from the country of your choice. As Captain, you'll lead your team through a fast-paced warm-up round, then quickly move into the heat of real volleyball competition. You'll decide when to spike, when to lob, when to make a diving save - everything just like the captain of a real volleyball team! Play against a friend or challenge the computer. Either way, Nintendo's true-to-life graphics and realistic game play will bring all the fun and excitement of voleyball right into your home!
